using System;

using System.Text;
using System.Threading.Tasks;
using AsyncGenerator.TestCases;
using NUnit.Framework;

namespace AsyncGenerator.Tests.AnonymousFunctions.Input
{
	public partial class MethodWithDelegate
	{
		public Task TestAsync()
		{
			try
			{
				Assert.DoesNotThrowAsync(() => ReadAsync(s => Console.WriteLine(s)));
				return Task.CompletedTask;
			}
			catch (Exception ex)
			{
				return Task.FromException<object>(ex);
			}
		}

		public Task ReadAsync(Action<string> action)
		{
			return SimpleFile.ReadAsync();
		}
	}
}
